content: @WG-async-await In absence of a meeting this week, use this thread to post a small update about your progress, if you're blocked with anything, that sort of thing.

For me: I've not done much this past week, was working on some other PRs, aiming to loop back and revisit the drop order PR with (hopefully) some fresh eyes this week. There's been no further reviewing or comments on it, so otherwise no updates there.
I think https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/59111 is probably as good as it gets for now. Probably best to ship it...
(At least then people will get better error messages in nightly)
Been working in C# recently and witnessed the quantity of revisions the System.Reactive package has had. Will be really great to get async await and futures stabilized.

My update on the #52924 stream:

Status update: I'm nearly done with an initial implementation. The analysis is done and now I'm working on the layout code. Most of the time has been spent understanding what's going on currently, the implementation itself doesn't seem that hard.
